fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Explode**: Deal a unstoppable attack to your target and their two nearest alive neighbors next night, and then deal an unstoppable attack to yourself.
**Creep**: You are unaffected by every action used on you.
**Farm Gunpowder**: Give the current head role one gunpowder.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -If you are killed, the head role gains two gunpowder.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
